documents.document: These scary times are frightening, Covid and worry over Christmas- look after your #HASHTAG# it’s easy to be overwhelmed
I find it hard to have faith in the world when this happens, why would people do this? #URL#
I deleted the “bear rocking a tree whilst men exercise whilst fighting” video tweet that I saw online, there must have been some animal cruelty involved, so therefore not cool. Poor bear .
Don’t forget during these turbulent political times that the negativity can drive your mental health into the ground. Look after yourself and don’t forget you are never alone #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# #USER# #USER# these are faked photoshopped tweets to incite violence on me please report #URL#
#USER# #USER# No just leave her alone, she must be having a bad day. I don’t mind what she says, let her be

Hey! A comedian has supported trans people - right everyone let’s go through ever word they’ve ever said in their career - screen grab it and make everyone else who supports trans EXPLAIN the context, because we mustn’t let people support transpeople - throw ribbons now #URL#
#USER# I love that photo and I love dogs so am happy they spend time thinking about me #URL#
#USER# #USER# Me too
Right off to bed, sausage dog is on MY side of the bed and I’ll have to “shunt” her over to husbands side- she’ll be raging #URL#
Your family must be proud of you Duncan trolling women online - I am not disappearing- but we see you 👀 #URL#
Honey is looking for dogs to bark at - she really shouts at them from her pram which is weird #URL#
#USER# #USER# I had a huge tumour so my op was pretty big, recovery was ok and took tine to get through it and process cancer diagnosis afterwards
Or what? #URL#
Peter Bone getting it wrong again with wishful thinking #URL#
#USER# The always end up deleting and locking their accounts
Such positivity on my twitter feed, thanks everyone for your love and support. #URL#
Anyway on a happy note I am doing comedy onstage this weekend at #USER# Friday and Saturday #URL#
Aww I am so sorry - it was fun though thanks for coming #URL#
#USER# #USER# am sorry i thought they hated Obama, loved guns and Trump and disliked immigrants. My bad #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
“Bella the Dancer in 1981” by Janey Godley #URL#

That beautiful moment when you walked into the school dinner hall and you realised they had caramel cake that day #URL#
I see the “we need to debate trans” gang are trawling Joe Lycett account trying desperately to find something -ANYTHING to be offended at

Oh #USER# caught out again - you swear but am not allowed to yet your TL is full of hatred towards Muslims who have never once came on twitter and told me not to swear. Only far right football accounts tell me what words to say - not Muslims! #HASHTAG# #URL#
Am awake - Honey decided to climb up the bed and sit on my head again, this is something she’s been doing since my diagnosis, she cuddles my head and sleeps on me ❤️❤️❤️❤️ #URL#
#USER# #USER# She is a rehome who has various health issues, pups too young, hernia problems and IMHA immunity disease, she does walk two miles a day though and now lives like a Queen #URL#
#USER# Welcome
#USER# Football is the main factor here - on twitter the majority or women getting abuse is from a majority or men with football in their bio #HASHTAG# all

So in 7 weeks time (due to me having Covid just now) I go in for a full hysterectomy and removal of some lymph nodes, with the possibility of chemo to follow after they check all the bits they whip out, thanks everyone for kind thoughts I ❤️NHS #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# It was deleted before I saw it, it’s a screen grab - next question ?
This weeks podcast is the memories triggered by a photo from 1978, were you alive? What were you doing back then? #URL#
Loved seeing #USER# on #USER# NWO show, brilliant work
I LOVE that accounts whom I block save the screengrab and brag about me blocking them, I am THAT important #URL#
Thanks #USER# for that amazing dinner The food was superb and I haven’t had such a good night in years
Every day … #URL#

My favourite Scottish well fired roll #URL#
Oh my god it's started they are changing the London street names to Muslim meat names #HASHTAG# nn#HASHTAG# #URL#

Slept on and off for over 28 hours, mental health not great with chemotherapy, awake at 7.30am facing how to hide away for another 24 hours between drinking enough to keep me hydrated & eating enough to stop my stomach hurting - one day at a time in this world today #URL#
#USER# #USER# I remember poverty and hunger in the 70s can you imagine the over crowded poverty in the 40s?
#USER# My gp took a blood test then sent me to hospital next day to get scan - no mention of rapid access Unit then I had to wait 7 weeks for op
From me #URL#

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# They’re fake

Post operation wind pain, the hysterectomy and the scar wound is NOTHING to the pain of “gas” slowly torturing my colon tonight, and yes I have tried peppermint EVeRYTHING - been in all sorts of contorted positions and the pain is extreme - each fart welcomed like a new baby #URL#
#USER# I’m buying “fake Lego” and velvet slippers
Almost and I mean ALMOST argued back on twitter today but remembered my therapists advice and the toffee hammer aversion technique 😂😂😂😂😂 #URL#
“Women comics less likely to receive criticism and anyway they’re not funny, now listen give this RW man comic work please?” #URL#

Thanks to EVERYONE sending me love and support today and wonderful photos - my heart is full and I wish I could reply to you all - the abuse online is awful, but now being dealt with legally and thanks everyone of you for standing with me ❤️ #URL#
#USER# It’s hard, distraction works, but then if he’s determined to have a big melt down, as long as he’s not hurting himself, let it run it’s course, don’t panic and know you’re a good mum

This weeks podcast is all about a photo from 1978, the music, the politics and how I lived in Redcar - what are your memories of that year (if you are old enough) have a listen #URL#

My First Christmas tree of the year in Dumfries ! #URL#
Its Saturday and today’s “flood my timeline with happiness” subject is show me in images if you can- fashion from your era - I’ll start with “wedding mid 80s” #URL#

#USER# Oh god, he’s got all the facts and he does know stuff but he forgets names and dates and ends up saying REPEATEDLY “she then married him and then him and they had kids, forget their names, but aye, that’s what happened” 😂😂😂
I thought that was a wee Donald Trump coming away from the van until I zoomed in #URL#

Because my tour ended so abruptly due to ill health, I never got a chance to thank everyone who came out to the shows up and down the UK and packed out all the venues. Thank you so much to every theatre who supported me and every audience member who cheered me on that tour ❤️ #URL#

I don’t think today CAN get any better
Who here, in the 70s wanted a Purdey hair cut and your mammy just did a shonky bowl cut with the same scissors she used to cut wallpaper? Mine did 😂 took a year to grow it out #URL#
The park is pitch dark in parts, what were they thinking? #URL#

Then in the way dreams are, without context the cop has my bag and I grab my phone and see there are videos of me stealing a toddler off a bus! I see cancer meds are safe - a woman screams at me “you stole a baby” the police take me to the station for questions
What ? Priests are gay? Surely not ! #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# Well done mate
My niece sent me a photo of her Christmas tree and her cat who pooped out in time for the shot #URL#
#USER# Awwww so cute

As if I don’t have enough to panic me, I just experienced a vision disturbance like a big flashing jagged light aura flashing round my eye, thank god for the NHS and my GP who reassured me by phone that it’s a migraine related symptom, even though I don’t have pain -was so scared #URL#
Husband who didn’t want a dog is sleeping with her lying like a swaddled baby on his legs #URL#
Wonder how many Somalians have committed mass shooting in USA? I mean now he’s stopping all these immigrants coming in surely all the mass shootings will stop? Surely? #HASHTAG# #URL#

Dear Alba supporter I fully apologised - has Chris? Have a safe 2022 and may you have a peaceful year. 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍⚧️ #URL#

Thanks Elaine #URL#

Every time they share fake tweets, tell lies about my family, insist I am too ugly to be alive, send me abuse, tag in TV companies to get me cancelled for arguing back and pile on with hate, many of them lose their accounts..and…still I rise. GOOD MORNING ! #URL#
#USER# She got scrambled eggs for breakfast and the tapping of her wee toe nails on the floor was like Fred in full flow #URL#

#USER# Imagine my aunt was live on TV telling people her brother was innocent and my sister and I were liars, after he was jailed for abusing us? After a full jury trial which found him guilty? I would be horrified
#USER# Welcome - even the weird thoughts and the happy ones

Nicola Sturgeon used the phrase “Tsunami of cases” describing Omicron and so many prominent Scottish unionists spent DAYS and I mean DAYS picking apart her phraseology. Boris used the phrase “Tidal wave of cases” NOT A FUCKING WORD - it must be exhausting for them
Thanks Manda #URL#

Of all the side effects of chemo nobody really mentioned my mental health and I will do my best to speak about this when I come through this - one day #URL#

#USER# I hear you but -Not all tenements were like that, I lived in one for years that was built in 1800s with inside toilets and was stunning- overcrowding happened on multiple dwellings in inner cities

The first time I saw garlic - a short story 1979 I lived with my 16yr old boyfriend- in my grandpas back bedroom. I had never been taught to cook, BF mum ( deceased when he was 13) was a cook for biz executives in fancy offices in Glasgow ( was a thing back then)

I am am Scottish born Protestant for those whose interest is piqued about the IRA claim - it’s hysterically funny but does give me a good joke to tell onstage about him and if you know YOU KNOW #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# Hope his kids don’t see what he says to women online, or his employers
#USER# Sending you all my love and condolences, oh mate am so sorry

Cried reading this, the #USER# family and my family in Shettleston were inextricably linked and now Giovanna and my family in the West End carry on that tradition of sharing love, laughter and food. So much so that they feature in my new fiction book - the link continues #URL#
She can hear an egg crack three streets away #URL#

Honey gets her first acting job #URL#
Well that’s my tea gone #URL#
Don’t forget to look after your mental health and speak out, you are never alone. #HASHTAG#
Thanks to everyone sending me such positive kindness #URL#
“#HASHTAG# look after each other, prioritise tasks, block the negativity and don’t argue with people who you really have NO debate with” tips my therapist taught me
I now have my own Message Bag on my store You can buy “Ma message bag” #URL#

New day and some lovely flowers arrived, thanks to everyone in Arbroath and the surrounding areas who welcomed me back onstage - 18 months down the line and here we are, keeping each other’s life jackets inflated ❤️ #HASHTAG# #URL#
Whoooop 200 years of Tory finally ended #URL#
I am asking you all respectfully to stop tagging me in this thread I am trying to remain positive and look after my mental health
#USER# #USER# Fake
New stock has arrived - we post globally and you can buy my book here #URL# if you feel like supporting me thanks #URL#
“My Son” on Amazon - tense and fabulous drama. The Scottish backdrop lends itself to the twisted story line #URL#
To ALL the NHS staff working hard, who don’t stop for Christmas- we are forever in your debt
“Hello, do you have a wee bit of toast for a small dog with this face?” #URL#

I don’t think I say this enough, but THANKS to everyone of you supporting me, reporting fake tweets, standing by me and coming to my shows, etc..sometimes I focus on the hatred and not the actual people who send me love. This site can be a shitehole, then I remember all the love #URL#

Sending me abuse for supporting trans people, calling me mentally ill, thick, unfunny, stupid etc …won’t win people to your side, it will gather people who actively abuse women online to jump into your bandwagon #URL#
Come see me on tour and get tickets on #URL# #URL#
I can’t stop laughing at her singing a sweary owl song #URL#
Katie Hopkins can say what she likes as its 'freedom of speech' if YOU tweet hate to a famous person cops will arrive at your door. #HASHTAG#
“Mate, I’m going home, you stay out if you want to” #URL#
Can’t sleep, got up and this wee face followed me through the house, it’s as if she knows something isn’t right - dogs are the best #URL#

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# Where did I have a pop at a recoveri… ?? ahhh I see what your doing… your attributing your lack of happiness and blaming me… what else do you do when your not harassing successful women online? Fishing? Oyster shucking? Tapestry?
Glasgow garden festival 1988 and look at my photo! It’s like a studio head shot 😂😂😂 #URL#

I am not a politician - I’m a woman who swears for living, why do I have to be held to same standards as a Tory leader? And I was right about Trump #URL#

#USER# #USER# These are well documented faked photoshopped tweets - by all means hate me for all your worth but this is fake

Life goes on - I am trying to stay positive and keep a strong mental attitude #URL#

#USER# Thanks Edwin, your kind support means so much
#USER# The smell of anger, an unfulfilled life and sneering at the wee girl who is good at drawing
Good morning the lot of you ( nearly afternoon) ok November, bring it on ! #URL#
For some reason I am dreaming of a hot sausage roll with beans #URL#
the amount of black people annoyed I wrote "we are descendants of highlands clearances" to Kanye. offended are ye? get fucked. #HASHTAG#
Thanks so much #URL#
“My Phillips screw driver, it’s in the box under the stairs, it’s got a blue handle” #URL#
#USER# My own fault but thanks

The sheer careful gentle love & attention that wee woman showed me will stay with me forever. You’ll pass her on the bus as she gets on with her mask & wee bags and heads home after her shift, she’s got a wee dog and a granddaughter she looks after & she’s good at brushing hair

“Honey you will look cute in a Santa Hat”
HONEY “NO, not today Satan” #URL#
I get that people need to punt and advertise and I am not knocking it, was just in a bad shitty place today

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# This is a fake tweet to incite sectarian abuse and attacks on me and has been reported over four years- Rangers fans keep posting it and keep losing their accounts #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER#
Sending everyone on my timeline some love and peace today, it’s a frustrating time and full of anger and angst. We may laugh and we may scream but look after your own #HASHTAG# #URL#
Sure, blame Meghan why not? you absolute haunted arse boils #URL#
Watching my BAFTA movies and documentaries and the Phil Lynot one is just fabulous
Passive comments about smashing me with a hammer are laughed off by Scottish Right wing men #HASHTAG# #URL#

My mammy also had a shopping bag like this, you opened it and smelt of wet plastic, it had loose broken cigarettes and dirty swizels she used as bingo markers rattling about the bottom and a black plastic purse with a big clasp. She had it wrapped over her arm everywhere she went #URL#
#USER# Oh no thanks I appreciate that but I am all good and your kind thoughts are better

My uncle was ex army, far right -Orange Lodge, unionist, Royalist and the pressure from those Sectarian led groups on me was also pretty dismal “I was letting the side down” the “Orange Beast” only got two years in jail #URL#

I like calling my tumour Bunty, it’s affectionate, she’s part of me and I grew her, albeit against my will, she will be getting evicted soon and I will say goodbye to her and hopefully make a full recovery thanks NHS for all your care during these trying times
